name: Crock Pot Chicken
ingredients: 1 can Cream of Chicken Soup ¾ cup sour cream
1 can Cream of Celery Soup 1 package Good Seasons dry Italian Dressing.
steps: Thaw 4 chicken breasts and place in a greased crock pot. For the sauce, combine:
Cook on high for 2 ½ -­‐ 3 hours. Take chicken out and whisk sauce. Sometimes I like to shred the chicken and
then combine it with some of the sauce, using the rest of the sauce as extra gravy.
Serve with rice. I like to caramelize some onions and serve them over the top.
